body: D41696  accomplishes some of what this issue needs to do.  See its summary for remaining work

for future reference, I believe the way to detect temporary-ness of nameless objects in the DDL end trigger is to join the trigger input table with pg_depend (he has three columns) to get the OID of the relation in question then somehow check it for temporary-ness.
Also, remove the need to set `enable_manual_ddl_replication` to use temp tables on target.

rename.from: [DocDB] Make automatic replication mode work with temporary objects
rename.to: [xCluster] Make automatic replication mode work with temporary objects
